name: Song of Spiral Sam
description:
you have been banished to the spiral realm for committing dream crimes. the point of the game is to find different instruments for the NPC's to play, so you can play a song for Spiral Sam. if he likes your song he will release you from the dream realm. each NPC only wants to play a certain instrument, so find an instrument they would play and bring it to them. 

the song that plays at the end of the game is different depending on which instruments you chose for each NPC. 

game created in 48 hours for the ludum dare game jam
